title: The Sponsor
description:
Pablo Torre, Israel Gutierrez and Sarah Spain debate who has the advantage in the Celtics-Heat series ahead of Game 1 and if Deandre Ayton will be back in Phoenix next year.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
